name: Cubik
description:
Cubik is a minimalist puzzle game revolving around cubes. Each cube can be rotated vertically or horizontally. The goal of the game is to match all cube color with the background.



When holding the cube, four wings will appear indicating the color of the unseen four faces. When dragging, one wing will appear indicating the color of the upcoming face.



Be mindful, cubes can be linked together, where action on one impacts all.



More twists are awaiting in your journey.

The full game will feature 4 worlds, each comprises of 20 handcrafted levels. Please play the free demo, wishlist and comment!
